column4: It's no wonder that most of the computers in the world have Windows on them. I am not condoning Microsoft's practices, but some one comes in with no-bs problem looking for advice and gets told that their problem is not on topic. I hate Windows, but i know that if I have a problem I can call (even if I have to pay for it) and they can solve it in an ORGANIZED way. This is chaos. This is the first time that I have tried to actually t

ried to talk to other guru's. I think that I will just go back to reading manuals and solving problems the old fashioned way, perseverance and self reliance. All I wanted is for someone to recommend some help, not tell me how..
same holds true for ubuntu, call canocial and get live support if you wish
